tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_tracking ( 
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL, 
    current_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    designated_route VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    alert_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    deviance_reason TEXT, 
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    alert_text TEXT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Vehicle (vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_name STRING, route_id INT, current_location STRING)
CREATE TABLE Route (route_id INT PRIMARY KEY, route_name STRING, starting_point STRING, ending_point STRING)
CREATE TABLE Alert (alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_id INT, alert_message STRING, alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE vehicles ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_name VARCHAR(255), route_id INT, current_location VARCHAR(255), deviation_threshold FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE routes ( route_id INT PRIMARY KEY, route_name VARCHAR(255), route_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE alerts ( alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_id INT, alert_type VARCHAR(50), alert_description TEXT, alert_time TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE alert_triggers ( trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY, route_id INT, deviation_threshold FLOAT, trigger_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Vehicle(id INT, name VARCHAR(50), route_id INT, current_location VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE Route(id INT, route_name VARCHAR(50), coordinates JSONB);
CREATE TABLE Trigger(id INT, vehicle_id INT, trigger_type VARCHAR(50), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE Alert(id INT, trigger_id INT, alert_type VARCHAR(50), alert_message TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Notification(id INT, alert_id INT, notify_method VARCHAR(50), notify_contact VARCHAR(100));
